long_description: A serious road machine for long, fast rides and personal bests, our Novara Trenta features a lightweight high-performance wheelset, light Shimano Ultegra components and a stiff, nimble frame. American Classic Victory 30 wheels offer an aerodynamic profile, weight-saving low spoke count and durable, smooth-spinning performance. Lightweight frame features triple-butted, hydroformed tubes and offers a lively ride quality with a geometry that balances all-day comfort, agile handling and responsiveness. Fork boasts a tapered alloy steerer with a machined, 1-piece alloy crown for strength and stiffness where it counts; carbon legs help damp road vibrations and reduce weight. Tapered steerer enhances stiffness and responsiveness for confident, precise handling. Shimano Ultegra shifters and derailleurs offer light-action, precise shifts throughout the 22 gear combinations. FSA Gossamer Pro compact crankset and 11-28 cassette ensure you've got the right gearing for the task at hand, be it a challenging climb or a feisty city-limit sprint. Slim-profile, standard reach caliper brakes ensure responsive, powerful braking for subtly shaving off speed in the group or dumping mph's coming into a hairpin on a descent. Clement Strada LGG tires have a slightly textured center tread with a more-pronounced shoulder tread for good all-around traction and low rolling resistance. Please note: Pedals are not included. Specs on our Novara Trenta bike are subject to change.
